pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 17, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 17, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with his Highness the Aga Khan, 49th Hereditary Imam of the Shia Ismaili Muslims.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
